Column
--------------------------
```{r}
P <- Airbnb_Listings %>%
  ggplot() + geom_point(mapping = aes(x = county, y = occupancy_percentage )) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 5,angle = 90, vjust = 1, hjust=1))
ggplotly(P)

C <- Airbnb_Listings %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = location_lng, y = location_lat, fill = county, alpha = 0.1))
ggplotly(C)
```
